title: Hello Geekette
overview: Val√©rie is a "geekette" who lives in her imaginary world, while Greg is a boy who is not at all geeky and rather flirty. These two characters who seem to be separated by everything are roommates. Their apartment is the place where their respective friends oppose each other: Geek, Nerd, Metallic and Gothic in a camp; Flirty, Bobo and Trader in the other.
